Title: C.R. Smith Archive
Brief Description: Albumen photograph, captioned 'Throne of H.M. Shah of Persia', mounted in leather-bound album, part of the C.R. Smith archive, photographed by Antoin Sevruguin, assembled Sultanabad (modern Arak), Iran, 1895 - 1900
